control_description: Check if instance is public and security-group allows ingress traffic from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::0/0 to the ports for kerberos [88, 464, 749, 750] or ldap [389, 636].
risk: The instance might be exposed to the internet on these ports without proper security measures, leading to potential unauthorized access.
recommendation: Make sure to restrict incoming and outgoing traffic as strictly as possible.
